1360010.name: One Tile Man
1360010.description:
One Tile Man is a 2D Side Scroll Platformer inspired by Kaizo rom hacks from the Super Mario World community. It features fast paced action, precision platforming, uniquely designed levels with challenging gameplay. This game will take you on a journey through over 20 incredible levels with a wide variety of game mechanics, intense boss fights, and more! One Tile Man will certainly put your platforming skills to the ultimate test.

One Tile Man uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2020, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.”
